review: Works well. Voice search seems to only work for Amazon content. If that worked for all apps it would be 5 stars. Without voice recognition or a keyboard entering text to search is slow and painful.  It's an improvement on the built in apps for my "smart" Visio TV.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I am totally happy with this purchase. Unfortunately, I missed the special Amazon offer a few weeks back and paid the full $99 for it, but I have no regrets--it is well worth the price. It was very simple to learn and I was able to set it up with ease. I mapped it to my network and added PlexPass and Amazon Cloud as well. It didn't take much time to get it all working ...I would say I was fully operating within 15 - 20 minutes and this was mainly because I had to pull out my entertainment center to run and connect the cords.  It was great looking at all my pictures that I dumped in the cloud on a full size TV screen!  It is uniquely compact (both the box and remote).  I love the voice activation on the remote and the remote's signal is excellent.  Everything works absolutely great!  You can call out your favorite movie stars or the name of your favorite movie or TV show and BOOM--there it is instantly.  I absolutely love my new toy.  I watched shows and movies all day.  The picture comes in crystal clear too!With all of this said, I can't think of a single con to say about it, thus I gave it a full 5 star rating!  Amazon hit this one out of the Park!!!  I am already thinking about adding a second box in my home.
author: Raymond "Ray"

I would have purchased the less expensive stick instead of the full Amazon Fire TV.  Hopefully Amazon Fire TV does more than just the Fire Stick.
